<HEADLINE>ft letter govern cover privat export insur</HEADLINE>
<BYLINE>

London Page 1 Photograph Pierre Beregovoy, France's finance minister,
yesterday showed off a French idea for Ecu coins at a press conference in
Luxembourg. At the weekend meeting of EC finance ministers, Mr Beregovoy
said the Emu treaty 'must be written so that it does not pre-empt a UK
decision, while at the same time allowing the Emu process to go ahead'.

<HEADLINE>ft art lenni kravitz brixton</HEADLINE>
<BYLINE>

<HEADLINE>ft apr ft law report neglig valuer pay damag</HEADLINE>
<BYLINE>

<HEADLINE>ft apr cathay oper flight heathrow</HEADLINE>
<BYLINE>
